column1: UK Football game traffic updates will start at approximately 9:00 a.m. on Saturday August 31

column4: 9 a.m. to 12 p.m. - Three lanes inbound and one lane outbound.
12 p.m. to 3 p.m. - Normal lane configuration.
3 p.m. to 5:30 p.m. - Three lanes outbound and one lane inbound.
5:30 p.m. - Change to normal lane configuration.
